attributes.action: Change the law on locum psychiatrists giving final diagnoses on elderly out patients
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Elderly patients are put at risk from the ineptitude of  Locum Psychiatrists, some elderly people are being misdiagnosed, - passed from one locum to another without due care and attention of the patients needs, -- and given medication that is not needed.
The basic rights of the elderly are being taken away, -- some have nowhere to turn, -- they look to the Health Profession for help but unfortunately find all too often that help is not forthcoming, -- and have to fight for what is  rightfully theirs.
Many elderly people do not have the finances to fight their cases and are subsequently ignored.
I now implore the Government to investigate the serious malfunction of many Locum Psychiatrists in doing their duty.
